content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=LRG&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=LRG&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>LRG List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=LRG</link>  <description>LRG List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2015-01-14T12:37:35Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;186747a0.1501"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;1bf63827.1410"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;25a053e1.1410"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;61d33ee0.1408"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;186747a0.1501">   <title>Shropshire Museum Resource Centre </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;186747a0.1501</link>   <description> Dear LRG supporter,<br><br>I guess many of you will already be aware that Shropshire Council is proposing to reduce expenditure on their County Museum Resource Centre situated in Ludlow and make three staff, including their only geologist, redundant. The following email and attachments explain the situation in more detail.<br><br>There is a strong feeling that the research community needs to stress to the Council the international scientific importance of the material that they are guarding, and I am very grateful that Peter Warren has offered to draft a message to the Council expressing the concerns of the international science community. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T12:36:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Howe, Michael P.A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;186747a0.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;1bf63827.1410">   <title>LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth - Saturday 15th November </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;1bf63827.1410</link>   <description> Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British &amp; Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>I am pleased to distribute the draft programme for the forthcoming meeting at BGS Keyworth on Saturday 15th November. We have had a number of good talks offered, but little interest in the core workshop, so we will restrict ourselves to the talks, business meetings, lunch, tea &amp; coffee, and socialising. There is space for additional talks and participants. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-30T17:28:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Howe, Michael P.A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;1bf63827.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;25a053e1.1410">   <title>LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth + "Virtual Field Trip" in the Core Store - Saturday 15th November </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;25a053e1.1410</link>   <description> Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British &amp; Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>The returns are in and Saturday 15th November wins by 1 vote. Currently we are looking at about a dozen participants, so please spread the word and see if you can encourage a few more to attend. Likewise, we have 5 talks at the moment, but we certainly have space for a few more.... [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-02T17:30:18+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Howe, Michael P.A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;25a053e1.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;61d33ee0.1408">   <title>Proposed LRG / BIGG speaker meeting at Keyworth + "Virtual Field Trip" in the Core Store </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;61d33ee0.1408</link>   <description> Dear Members of the Ludlow Research Group and the British &amp; Irish Graptolite Group,<br><br>I'm afraid it has not proved possible to organise the intended LRG meeting on Anglesey this autumn, due largely to access problems with many of the key localities. However, we have at least one firm offer for next year (Ludlow graptolites of the Long Mountain), plus possible alternatives. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-29T17:53:35+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Howe, Michael P.A.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LRG;61d33ee0.1408</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
